page.title: 11THE LOCAL SHOP
page.content: THE LOCAL SHOP KEEPS A VAST RANGE OF GOODS, FROM MEAT TO KNITING WOOLS. IN THIS WAY IT CATERS FOR THE LOCAL NEEDS OF THE INHABITANTS WHO WOULD OTHERWISE HAVE TO TRAVEL A MINIMUM OF FIVE MILES TO THE NEAREST TOWN. CHEESE IS A VERY POPULAR ITEM, THEY SELL 90LBS OF CHEESE A WEEK. MARS BARS ARE THE MOST POPULART CONFECTIONERY AND CIGARETTES ARE ALSO A GOOD MONEY MAKER. FRUIT AND VEGETABLES DO NOT MAKE SO MUCH MONEY BECAUSE THEY GO BAD IF NOT QUICKLY SOLD AND JUDGING THE DEMAND IS DIFFICULT. THE POST OFFICE HAS A GREAT INFLUENCE ON THE TRADE IN THE REST OF THE SHOP. WHILE PEOPLE ARE POSTING LETTERS OR CASHING PENSIONS THEY WILL STOP AND BUY SOMETHING FROM THE SHOP. THE POST OFFICE IS ALSO THE LOCAL BANK. IT IS VERY CONVENIENT TO BE ABLE TO GET MONEY WITHOUT THE EXPENSE OF A JOURNEY INTO TOWN.
